Dan Vadis https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dan_Vadis 0 Dan Vadis (born Constantine Daniel Vafiadis, 3 January 1938 – 11 June 1987) was an American actor famous for his lead roles in many Italian films made in the 1960s. Dan_Vadis ( born Constantine_Daniel_Vafiadis , 3_January_1938 – 11_June_1987 ) was an_American_actor_famous for his_lead_roles in many_Italian_films made in the_1960s .
